root.title: hard rock cafe plc set initi u. offer
root.body: hard rock cafe plc say file initi u. offer 2,240,000 american depositari share repres 11.2 mln class ordinari share say 240,000 ad sell current sharehold lead underwrit drexel burnham lambert inc compani say proce use financ addit restaur expans exist restaur retail oper repay debt
